MetricItems.description: On Android, we currently have a limitation where we only support a maximum of 2 `MetricItem`s. Additionally, on Android, `LeadingUnit` of `MetricItem` is supported only when there is exactly 1 `MetricItem` in the array.

ShowProgress.description: This determines if the KPI Progress View should be enabled

Progress.description: This is used only when `ShowProgress` is enabled and only used in iOS

OnPress.description: Action/Rule to be triggered when the item is pressed.

Target.description: Definition of the target binding to dynamically populate the collection. You can also set this to binding/rule to return an array of data items. Note: If this is set to binding/rule, you must return an array of data items, you can't return Target definition.
